title: Looking to buy N28 Allen and Ginter King Kelly
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking to buy N28 Allen and Ginter King Kelly
posts.post_content:
Would love to add a low grade, but nice looking N28 Allen and Ginter King Kelly to my personal collection

PM me if you have one you’d like to discuss - thx!

Jeff

Still looking for Allan and Ginter King Kelly - low grade, prefer no paper loss on back. 

Won fantasy baseball league and want to celebrate by adding King to my HOF collection. 

Also open to cash+trades if you have HOFer needs. 

Thx
